title: Unified Field Theory - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/24/21
itunes:title: Unified Field Theory - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/24/21
description:
George Noory and author Mark Fiorentino explore his career examining Einstein's Unified Field Theory, how time and matter behave, and whether it will ever be possible to develop technology for time travel or Star Trek-like transporters.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
